thread.title: Pinpoint Intelligence Adds Two Merchant Processing Experts to Its Staff in Critical Roles

author: cnbc.com
title: Pinpoint Intelligence Adds Two Merchant Processing Experts to Its Staff in Critical Roles
text:
FRESH MEADOWS, N.Y., March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Pinpoint Payments, a Pinpoint Intelligence company, the leader in merchant payment processing solutions, announces the addition of two new key hires. Pinpoint welcomes Sandra Vancol as Head Underwriter and Sharon Loh as Operations Manager. The addition of these two seasoned professionals will allow Pinpoint to expand their business while continuing to offer the best support and options for merchants, including online retailers and hard-to-place businesses.
Sandra joins Pinpoint with over 15 years of experience in risk analysis and underwriting. Her career has included specific expertise in reviewing merchant accounts to discern risk as well as underwriting a variety of merchant applications. Sandra's main responsibilities at Pinpoint will be to lead the underwriting process, review new accounts before submission to financial institutions and work with clients to ensure they are in compliance. Her knowledge in the industry will be a huge asset to Pinpoint and their clients.
Sharon brings over 10 years of payment processing experience to the Pinpoint team. She has worked with a variety of merchant services providers, dealing with annual processing of $850 million. With years of management expertise, Sharon will lead the customer service team at Pinpoint. With a rich history in the merchant processing industry, Sharon will also handle onboarding of new clients as well as day to day operations. Her insight and understanding of the industry will offer Pinpoint clients excellence in service and guidance.
Nicholas Ruggieri, Co-Founder and Chief Sales Officer, said of these new hires, "Sandra and Sharon bring a wealth of experience and expertise to Pinpoint. Sandra is considered a risk and compliance expert in the field, and we're very pleased to have her on our team. Sharon will make an immediate impact at Pinpoint, enhancing the customer experience and finding operational efficiency opportunities."
About Pinpoint Intelligence
Pinpoint Processing, a global leader in payment processing solutions, offers a unique blend of merchant services for traditional online retailers and hard-to-place businesses, including those considered to be high-risk. Utilizing their proprietary software, TAP, Pinpoint enables their clients to reduce online payment risks, process payments more securely and increase profitability.
Pinpoint's experience as a front runner in fraud prevention and chargeback management provides extraordinary value in keeping merchant accounts healthy.
While the payment ecosystem is at times complex and confusing, working with Pinpoint is simple and easy. Learn more about how Pinpoint delivers solutions to merchants at pinpointintel.com .
CONTACT: Nicholas Ruggieri, (888) 370-9596, ext. 1003
